QuestData.Title: Unleash Hell
QuestData.Description: I will NOT let the Horde gain a foothold on these shores before we do! If you're looking to jump into the fray, I've got a spare gyrocopter for you at the end of the runway. An attack run is already programmed in, all you have to do is concentrate on shooting.$B$BUnleash hell upon these orcs!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Skyfire Gyrocopter to slay 60 of the Garrosh'ar troops and destroy 8 Garrosh'ar Shredders, and then sink the Bladefist Reaper and Stygian Scar.
QuestData.CompletionText: What are you waiting for?! Scorch the ground beneath them!
QuestData.RewardText: A proper welcome for the Horde to this new land!
